name: RunVive!
description:
Survive in a Sci-Fi desert from something really strange... and sticky!

Game made during the "Miz Jam 1", where the main rule was to use the art kit provided by the host, "Miziziziz".

* Controls:

Both Keyboard and Gamepad are supported (tested only with Xbox Controller but it should work with other types) =>

- Move: WASD or ZQSD or Left Stick
- Attack: Space or X button (Square on a PS4 controller)

(Unused action: Flame=> Enter or B button (Circle on PS4 controller), currently it does the same thing as the sword)

*Music & SFX credits:

- Main menu => "Inner Space 2" by AliceMako (link: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/958960)

- Gameplay => "Operation" by Sekter (link: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/958051)

- Effect sounds are from the sonniss free royalty bank sounds of GDC 2019, here is the link:https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc19/ (Except the walk sound, which is from the feet of my girlfriend, her instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ninakirovakan/)
